Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlockingPlayer, HumanPlayer, RandomPlayer, SmartPlayer
public class Player extends Object implements Constants
Player Class Player for tic-tac-toe and all of its methods to make a move on the board.
Author:
bains

    makeMove() reads the user/player input for row and column to place their mark on the Board

    play() will ensure Board is not full and nobody has won yet so a Player can play a move
